scripts.build-gateway: docker build -f devops/gateway.Dockerfile -t gateway . && docker tag gateway bparra/gateway && docker push bparra/gateway
scripts.build-websocket: docker build -f devops/websocket.Dockerfile -t websocket-demo . && docker tag websocket-demo bparra/websocket-demo && docker push bparra/websocket-demo
scripts.build-messanger: docker build -f devops/messanger.Dockerfile -t messanger-demo . && docker tag messanger-demo bparra/messanger-demo && docker push bparra/messanger-demo
scripts.build-frontend: docker build -f devops/frontend.Dockerfile -t react-demo . && docker tag react-demo bparra/react-demo && docker push bparra/react-demo
scripts.deploy: docker-compose -f devops/docker-compose.yml pull && docker stack deploy -c devops/docker-compose.yml message-app
